paragraphs: Are you keeping warm? I hope so. I started to write about how much I miss you, but now I have something else to tell you. I met someone. I'm sorry to break it to you this way, but I couldn't wait to tell you.
He's a Dark Elf, an envoy with the Ebonheart Pact. He came into the forge and we started talking. One thing led to another, and … well, you know.
He's exotic and exciting. And he's very good to me.
Well, I need to go now. Bye!
